law.catch_line: Absent substantial evidence to the contrary, in a proceeding for the enforcement of a claim under th...
law.text:
Absent substantial evidence to the contrary, in a proceeding for the enforcement of a claim under this title, it is presumed that:
the claim comes within this title;
sufficient notice was given to the employer; and
the employer or its insurer was not prejudiced by a failure to file a claim for an accidental personal injury within 60 days after the date of the accidental personal injury.
